chapters.title: Chapter 50:  Choosing Enemies
chapters.info: Lady Ailil Riatin, p. 740—Slim, dignified woman with big dark eyes. Not young, but pretty. She is Toram Riatin's sister, and would have done anything for him if he asked her to. She is also the daughter of King Galldrian. She is tall for a Cairhienin woman (and only for a Cairhienin woman&hellp;). She had pledged for Rand, but disappeared after the attack by Asha'man. The last Rand saw her, she was bound with the Power under a bed. Since Toram is assumed dead, she has assumed the High Seat of House Riatin. She is slim and middle-aged, and a vocal supporter of Elayne.
